Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the extent to which President Trump has silenced his scientists and only allowed Vice President Pence to speak.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide sufficient evidence to support the assertion that President Trump has not allowed his scientists to speak.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the scientists, specifically Dr. Anthony Fauci, are the only ones who know what they're talking about.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative reasons for why Vice President Pence may be speaking instead of the scientists.
